attributes.action: make kinship carers allowances the same throughout Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: kinship carers do not qualify for the same benefits as a Social Services registered foster carer Therefore kinship carers get different payments depending on their councils,and the districts they live in  Payments for each child should be the same for every kinship carer

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
